com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiSlider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>

    public class GuiSlider
extends GuiContainer
implements IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>
    This GUI node represents a slider knob.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean isDraggingDisabled
      If true dragging the slider will do nothing.
